panels.description: The number of clusters being reported.
panels.title: Number of clusters

panels.description: The number of nodes being reported.
panels.title: Number of nodes

panels.description: Percentage of clusters that have all nodes that are currently reporting healthy.

targets.expr: sum(min by(job, couchdb_cluster) (couchdb_couch_replicator_cluster_is_stable{job=~"$job", couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster"})) / count(count by(job, couchdb_cluster) (couchdb_couch_replicator_cluster_is_stable{job=~"$job", couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster"})) * 100

panels.title: Clusters healthy

panels.description: The total number of file descriptors open aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Open OS files

panels.description: The total number of open databases aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Open databases

panels.description: The number of database writes aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Database writes

panels.description: The number of database reads aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Database reads

panels.description: The number of view reads aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: View reads

panels.description: The number of view requests that timed out aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: View timeouts

panels.description: The number of temporary view reads aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Temporary view reads

panels.description: The number of bulk requests aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Bulk requests

panels.description: The average request latency quantiles aggregated across all nodes.

targets.expr: avg by(job, couchdb_cluster, quantile) (couchdb_request_time_seconds{job=~"$job", couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster", quantile=~"0.5"})
avg by(job, couchdb_cluster, quantile) (couchdb_request_time_seconds{job=~"$job", couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster", quantile=~"0.75"})
avg by(job, couchdb_cluster, quantile) (couchdb_request_time_seconds{job=~"$job", couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster", quantile=~"0.95"})
avg by(job, couchdb_cluster, quantile) (couchdb_request_time_seconds{job=~"$job", couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster", quantile=~"0.99"})

panels.title: Request latency quantiles

panels.description: The request rate split by HTTP Method aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Request methods

panels.description: The responses grouped by HTTP status type (2xx, 3xx, 4xx, and 5xx) aggregated across all nodes.
panels.title: Response status overview

panels.description: The response rate split by good HTTP statuses aggregated across all nodes.

targets.expr: sum by(job, couchdb_cluster, code) (rate(couchdb_httpd_status_codes{job=~"$job", couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster", code=~"[23].*"}[$__rate_interval])) != 0

panels.title: Good response statuses

panels.description: The response rate split by error HTTP statuses aggregated across all nodes.

targets.expr: sum by(job, couchdb_cluster, code) (rate(couchdb_httpd_status_codes{job=~"$job", couchdb_cluster=~"$couchdb_cluster", code=~"[45].*"}[$__rate_interval])) != 0

panels.title: Error response statuses
